app.title: My GPT Wrapped
app.subtitle: Transform your ChatGPT history into a beautiful, shareable wrapped experience. Discover your AI personality, hidden patterns, and more.

upload.howToExport: How to export your ChatGPT data
upload.exportStep4: Wait for the email, download the zip

errors.invalidFile: This doesn't look like a ChatGPT export file. Please upload the conversations.json from your ChatGPT data export.
errors.noConversations: No conversations found in the file. Make sure you're uploading the right file.

welcome.title: Your AI Journey
welcome.analyzed: We analyzed {{conversations}} conversations and {{messages}} messages. Here's your story.

overview.title: By The Numbers
overview.subtitle: Your ChatGPT stats at a glance

topics.title: What You Talk About
topics.subtitle: Your most discussed topics

archetypes.midnight_coder_desc: You burn the midnight oil, crafting code while the world sleeps. Your best ideas come when the stars are out.
archetypes.curious_explorer_desc: Your insatiable curiosity knows no bounds. You explore every corner of knowledge with ChatGPT as your guide.
archetypes.creative_genius_desc: Words are your canvas and ChatGPT is your muse. You bring ideas to life through creative expression.
archetypes.code_wizard_desc: You wield code like magic, turning complex problems into elegant solutions with AI as your spellbook.
archetypes.deep_thinker_desc: You don't just scratch the surface‚Äîyou dive deep. Your conversations reveal a mind that loves thorough understanding.
archetypes.hustler_desc: Always building, always growing. You use AI to accelerate your business ambitions and career trajectory.
archetypes.eternal_student_desc: Learning is your superpower. You turn ChatGPT into your personal tutor for endless subjects.
archetypes.ai_whisperer_desc: You have a natural way with AI. Your diverse conversations show someone who truly understands how to get the best from ChatGPT.

styles.detailed: You tend to give detailed context in your conversations
styles.concise: You prefer getting straight to the point
